trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 主控集合<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewImageColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that display images.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewImageColumn 類別是特殊的類型的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>類別，用來以邏輯方式主機的儲存格顯示的影像。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewImageColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: DataGridViewImageColumn 具有相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>中每個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>的交集它。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell is capable of containing an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> or an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料格是否包含<xref:System.Drawing.Image>或<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>上的值，取決於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: Displaying icons is useful to accommodate images with transparency.
trans-unit.target: 顯示圖示適合容納影像的透明度。

trans-unit.source: By default, empty cells display a default error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，空白資料格會顯示預設的錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: To prevent this graphic from appearing for cell values equal to `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the cell style object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property to `null` before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免這個圖形顯示的資料格的值等於`null`或<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的儲存格樣式物件的屬性所傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性`null`之前加入至控制項的資料列。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 不過這不影響新的記錄的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免錯誤圖形新出現的資料列中會記錄何時控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>屬性值是`true`，您也必須其中一個明確地設定儲存格的值為`null`中控制項的處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件或資料行集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>的執行個體的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-衍生的類型與覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>屬性，傳回`null`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: 此資料行類型的預設排序模式是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, configuring it for use with cell values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>類別，設定用於資料格的值型別的<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This constructor calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>與`valuesAreIcons`參數值的`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref> class, optionally configuring it for use with <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> cell values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>類別，選擇性地設定它以搭配使用<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式會初始化資料行，藉由設定下列屬性。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property initialized to the `valuesAreIcons` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|The value of the `valuesAreIcons` parameter.| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if `valuesAreIcons` is `true` and type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> if `valuesAreIcons` is `false`.| To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> cell values is painted correctly, use this constructor with a `valuesAreIcons` parameter value of `true`.
trans-unit.target: |屬性 |值 | |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性初始化為新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>`valuesAreIcons`參數值。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>|值`valuesAreIcons`參數。 | |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性所傳回。 |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>物件的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle><xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性所傳回。 |標準錯誤的圖形類型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>如果`valuesAreIcons`是`true`如果輸入<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>`valuesAreIcons`是`false`。 | 若要確保的 alpha 色板<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正確繪製儲存格的值，請使用這個建構函式與`valuesAreIcons`參數值的`true`。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property of cells in this column will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that they will be set to values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示類型的值將會設定此資料行中的資料格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>屬性<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示它們會設定為值的型別<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用來建立新的儲存格的樣板。

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>類別初始化至新建立的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>這個屬性</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn>的建構函式

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 變更儲存格範本的內容不會立即影響資料行的現有儲存格的使用者介面 (UI)。

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: 重新產生資料行後，才明顯這些變更 (例如，則資料行排序或透過呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法)。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> ，後建立模型資料行中的所有資料格。

trans-unit.source: The set type is not compatible with type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 集合類型與不相容類型<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this column.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個資料行的完全相同複本。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to duplicate a column of cells.
trans-unit.target: 若要複製的資料格的資料行使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the cloned <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示複製<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行的預設儲存格樣式。

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|A standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, a standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回的預設<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>有以下的初始屬性值: |`DataGridViewCellStyle`屬性 |預設值 | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|型別<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>如果初始<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值的標準錯誤圖形`true`，否則標準錯誤的圖形類型<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>。 | 這些值會覆寫中指定的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>的控制項，但是可能會覆寫其他儲存格樣式屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the standard error graphic from appearing for `null` or <xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName> cell values, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for this cell style object to `null` or your own error graphic before adding rows to the control.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止標準錯誤圖形中出現的`null`或<xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>儲存格的值，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>這個儲存格樣式物件的屬性`null`或錯誤圖形，然後再將資料列加入至控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.DBNull.Value?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This does not affect the row for new records, however.
trans-unit.target: 不過這不影響新的記錄的資料列。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the error graphic from appearing in the row for new records when the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A> property value is `true`, you must also either explicitly set the cell value to `null` or your own error graphic in a handler for the control <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> event or set the column <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property to an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-derived type with an overridden <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> property that returns `null` or your own error graphic.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免錯誤圖形新出現的資料列中會記錄何時控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>屬性值是`true`，您也必須其中一個明確地設定儲存格的值為`null`或錯誤圖形控制項的處理常式中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded>事件或資料行集<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>的執行個體的內容<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell>-衍生的類型與覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A>屬性，傳回`null`或您自己的錯誤圖形。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.DefaultNewRowValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowsAdded> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AllowUserToAddRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>DefaultCellStyle 屬性所傳回之物件的屬性有值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值設定為`true`自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>為標準錯誤的圖形類型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>、 變更<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性值設定為`false`自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>為標準錯誤的圖形類型<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref>来套用為預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string that describes the column's image.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定字串，描述資料行的映像。

trans-unit.source: You can use the Description property to describe the image provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 [描述] 屬性來描述提供的映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: This description provides an accessible alternative to the image.
trans-unit.target: 此描述會提供可存取的替代至映像。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the description text is used when the cell value is copied onto the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 此外，儲存格的值會複製到剪貼簿時，會使用描述文字。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A> property of every cell in the column.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>資料行中每個資料格的屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: The textual description of the column image.
trans-unit.target: 資料行影像文字描述。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此資料行儲存格內顯示的圖示時的儲存格<> *> 屬性未設定且儲存格的<> *> 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Icon property specifies an icons that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Icon 屬性指定會顯示在當資料行不是資料繫結沒有值的資料格和儲存格的圖示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結資料行的資料格沒有相關聯的映像，會顯示標準錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: Using the Icon property rather than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property ensures that an alpha channel in an icon is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 使用圖示屬性而非<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>屬性可確保會正確繪製圖示中的有 alpha 色板。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Image> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要顯示<xref:System.Drawing.Image>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>屬性改為設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Drawing.Image>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> or the Icon property value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性表示是否儲存格會顯示個別儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A>或圖示的屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Image%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image displayed in the cells of this column when the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value*> property is not set and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此資料行儲存格內顯示的影像時的儲存格<> *> 屬性未設定且儲存格的<> *> 屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The Image property specifies an image that is displayed in cells with no values when the column is not data-bound and the cell's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: [影像] 屬性指定的映像，會顯示在當資料行不是資料繫結沒有值的資料格和儲存格的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a data-bound column whose cells do not have an associated image, a standard error graphic is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 資料繫結資料行的資料格沒有相關聯的映像，會顯示標準錯誤圖形。

trans-unit.source: If you want to display an <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> instead of an <xref:System.Drawing.Image>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property instead and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要顯示<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>而不是<xref:System.Drawing.Image>，將<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>屬性改為設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.ValuesAreIcons%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Image> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: This ensures that the alpha channel of the <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> is painted correctly.
trans-unit.target: 如此可確保的 alpha 色板<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正確繪製。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: You can also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of individual cells to indicate whether the cell displays the Image or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> property value when there is no cell value.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>個別儲存格，表示儲存格是否顯示影像的屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A>沒有資料格的值時的屬性值。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>顯示。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image layout in the cells for this column.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定此資料行儲存格中的影像配置。

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref> that specifies the cell layout.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>指定儲存格的版面配置。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCellLayout"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述資料行的字串。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>描述資料行。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether cells in this column display <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要顯示這個資料行中的資料格<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the alpha channel of <xref:System.Drawing.Icon> values is painted correctly, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要確保的 alpha 色板<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>正確繪製的值，這個屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Drawing.Icon>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個屬性取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性也設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>屬性中的資料行和重新整理每個資料格的資料行顯示。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageCell.ValueIsIcon%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: 若要覆寫指定個別資料格的值，設定資料格的值，設定資料行的值之後。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>屬性所傳回的物件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>屬性有值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>，變更要 ValuesAreIcons 屬性值`true`自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>為標準錯誤的圖形類型<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>.</xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value equal to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Icon>, changing the ValuesAreIcons property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to the standard error graphic of type <xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>值等於類型的標準錯誤圖形<xref:System.Drawing.Icon>，ValuesAreIcons 屬性值，以變更`false`自動設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>為標準錯誤的圖形類型<xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap>.</xref:System.Drawing.Bitmap> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Icon> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if cells display values of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果資料格會顯示型別的值<xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref>;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>資料格會顯示類型的值如果<xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewImageColumn.CellTemplate*>
